description: Try our easy to follow Spinach, Rocket & Risoni Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spinach, Rocket & Risoni Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle dressing over salad just before serving. Top with shaved parmesan and freshly ground black pepper.
